name: prtex
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1
body: -| wceq(c1, copab(s0, s1, wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))

comment: The equivalence relation generated by a partition is a set if and only if the partition itself is a set. (Contributed by Rodolfo Medina, 15-Oct-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.)
